headline.main: WOMEN OF 20 NATIONS HOLD DISCUSSION HERE; Consider Problems Related to International Situation

lead_paragraph: Under auspices of the National Committee on the Cause and Cure of War, women of nearly twenty nations gathered yesterday at the Hotel Roosevelt to exchange experiences and to discuss common problems related to the international situation.
abstract: Natl Com on Cause and Cure of War sponsors discussion by women of 20 nations

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WAR, CAUSE AND CURE OF, NATL COM ON THE
